org.gvsig.raster.georeferencing.swing.model

Interface GeoreferencingOptionsDataModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeorefOptionsDataModelImpl

    public interface GeoreferencingOptionsDataModel
    Data model for options to georeferencing. This a shared object to read and write properties selected by the user
